descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course explores the applications of seismology to studying earthquakes and their relation to plate tectonics: focal mechanisms, waveform modeling, earthquake geodesy, earthquake recurrence and hazards,plate motions and plate boundary processes are also included.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: An Introduction to Seismology, Earthquakes, and Earth Structure by Stein and Wysession, ISBN 9780865420786, Publisher's Price: $135.00
